CSSValueListLength.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The length read-only property of the
interface represents the number of s
in the list. The range of valid values of the indices is 0 to
length-1 inclusive.

blockquote.para:
This property was part of an attempt to create a typed CSS Object Model. This attempt has been abandoned, and most browsers do
not implement it.
To achieve your purpose, you can use:

CSSValueListLength.value: An unsigned long representing the number of s.
